import numpy as np
import pickle
from pyecg.data_info import *
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go



[docs]def reset_seed(seed_value= 22):
	from numpy import random
	import random as python_random
	import os
	import tensorflow as tf
	#must run every time
	random.seed(seed_value)
	tf.random.set_seed(seed_value)
	python_random.seed(seed_value)
	os.environ['PYTHONHASHSEED']=str(seed_value)



[docs]def integer_mapping(y,map, inverse=False):
	y=list(y)
	if not inverse:
		out = [map[i] for i in y]
	else:
		invmap = {v:k for k,v in map.items()}
		out = [invmap[i] for i in y]
	return np.array(out)



[docs]def mapping_AAMI(y,map):
	out = [map[i] for i in y]
	return out



[docs]def plot_loss(model_history, p=False):
	# Plot training & validation loss
	import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
	if p==True:
		plt.style.use('plotstyle.txt')

	plt.plot(model_history.history['loss'])
	plt.plot(model_history.history['val_loss'],'--')
	plt.title('Training Loss')
	plt.ylabel('Loss')
	plt.xlabel('Epoch')
	plt.legend(['Train', 'Validation'], loc='upper right')
	plt.show()

	expected = (len(sig)-overlap)/(win-overlap)
	print('Expexted:'+str(expected))




[docs]def save_data(ds, file_path=None):
	if file_path is None:
		print('File path must be provided')
	with open(file_path, 'wb') as f:
		pickle.dump(ds, f)
	print('File saved: ' + str(file_path))



[docs]def load_data(file_path=None):
	if file_path is None:
		print('File path must be provided')
	with open(file_path, 'rb') as f:
		ds = pickle.load(f)
		print('File loaded: ' + file_path)
	return ds




[docs]def plot_signal(data):
	#data: 1d signal as a pandas dataframe, numpy array, or a list
	if isinstance(data, pd.DataFrame):
		pass
	elif isinstance(data, (np.ndarray,list)):
		data = pd.DataFrame({'Time':range(len(data)), 'Signal':data})
	

	fig = px.line(data,title='ECG', x='Time',  y='Signal')

	#fig = go.Figure()
	'''
	fig.add_trace(
		go.Scatter(
			x=dfsignal['Index'],
			y=dfsignal['Signal'],
			#text=R_types,
			mode="lines",
			line=go.scatter.Line(color="black"),
			showlegend=False)
	)
	fig.add_trace(
		go.Scatter(
			x=R_locations,
			y=signal[R_locations],
			text=R_types,
			mode="markers",
			line=go.scatter.Line(color="red"),
			showlegend=False)
	)
	'''

	fig.update_xaxes(rangeslider_visible=True)
	fig.show()




[docs]def calc_class_weights(flag, y):
	if flag:
		from sklearn.utils import class_weight
		class_weights = class_weight.compute_class_weight('balanced', np.unique(y), y)
		class_weights = dict(zip(np.unique(y), class_weights))
		#dict(zip(FINAL_MAP_DICT, class_weights))
		return class_weights
	else:
		return None




import tensorflow as tf
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
cosine_similarity = tf.keras.metrics.CosineSimilarity(axis=-1)
from fastdtw import fastdtw


[docs]def normalized_cross_corr(a,b): 
	if len(a.shape)==1:
		a = (a - np.mean(a)) / (np.std(a) * len(a))
		b = (b - np.mean(b)) / (np.std(b))
		cor = np.correlate(a, b)
	elif len(a.shape)==2:
		cor = []
		for i in range(a.shape[0]):
			t = a[i]
			q = b[i]
			t = (t - np.mean(t)) / (np.std(t) * len(t))
			q = (q - np.mean(q)) / (np.std(q))
			c = np.correlate(t, q)
			cor.append(c)
		cor = np.array(cor)
	return np.mean(cor)



[docs]def sig_similarity_report(x_true,x_pred,y_true):
	from pyecg.data_handling import DataHandling
	dh = DataHandling()
	mse = []
	syms = [] 
	corr = []
	coss = []
	dtww = []
	for s in np.unique(y_true):
		ind = dh.search_label(y_true, sym=s)
		true = x_true[ind]
		pred = x_pred[ind]
		err = mean_squared_error(true, pred)
		cor = normalized_cross_corr(true,pred)
		cos = cosine_similarity(true, pred).numpy() #mayb wrong
		dtw = fastdtw(true,pred)[0]/len(true)
		mse.append(err)
		corr.append(cor)
		coss.append(cos)
		dtww.append(dtw)
		syms.append(s)

	dict_res_x = {'sym':syms, 'mse_x':mse, 'cor':corr, 'cos':coss, 'dtw':dtww}
	df_x = pd.DataFrame(dict_res_x)
	print(df_x.sort_values(by='cor'))






from scipy.spatial import distance


[docs]def sig_similarity_hist(x1, x2, y):
	from pyecg.data_handling import DataHandling
	dh = DataHandling()
	MSE = []
	COR = [] 
	COS = []
	DTW = []
	SYMS = []
	for s in np.unique(y):
		ind = dh.search_label(y, sym=s)
		x1_selected = x1[ind]
		x2_selected = x2[ind]
		for i in range(len(x1_selected)):
			s1 = x1_selected[i].reshape((1,-1))
			s2 = x2_selected[i].reshape((1,-1))        
			mse = mean_squared_error(s1, s2)
			cor = normalized_cross_corr(s1,s2)
			cos = 1-(distance.cosine(s1, s2))
			dtw = fastdtw(s1, s2)[0]
			MSE.append(mse)
			COR.append(cor)
			COS.append(cos)
			DTW.append(dtw)
			SYMS.append(s)

	dict_res = {'SYM':SYMS, 'MSE':MSE, 'COR':COR, 'COS':COS, 'DTW':DTW}
	df_res = pd.DataFrame(dict_res)
	return df_res




[docs]def get_var_size(var_type='all'):
	print('hhh')
	if var_type=='all':
		varss=set(dir())
	elif var_type=='local':
		varss=set(locals())
	elif var_type=='global':
		varss=set(globals())

	import sys
	ob={}
	for var in varss:
		ob[var]=sys.getsizeof(var)
	return ob
